mapper.insert: insert into tbl_attach (idx,num,uuid, uploadpath, filename, ip, day,writer) values (Attach_seq.nextval,#{num},#{uuid},#{uploadpath},#{filename},#{ip},sysdate,#{writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_attach WHERE num IN ( SELECT num FROM ( SELECT r.num, b.parentnum FROM tbl_attach r, tbl_board b WHERE r.num = b.num START WITH r.num = #{num} CONNECT BY b.parentnum = PRIOR r.num ) )
